entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
